articles.description: A new report (accessible here) from the UVES spectrograph of the European Very Large Telescope in Chile provides data on the anomalous…
articles.content: Logarithm of the ratio between the production rate of nickel to iron as a function of the logarithm of their total production rate. The new data from the Very Large Telescope for 3I/ATLAS (red square… [+4511 chars]
